maintainer.description: Also, you can find me on IRC (Libera.Chat) as mva, or in Telegram as @mva_name (in @russian_gentoo group or @grouplinux)
maintainer.name: Vadim A. Misbakh-Soloviov

pkgmetadata.longdescription: Gdu is intended primarily for SSD disks where it can fully utilize parallel processing. However HDDs work as well, but the performance gain is not so huge.
